actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Rural Development, Electrification.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Rural Development and Rural Electrification

official_title: A bill to amend the Farm Credit Act of 1971 and the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to improve rural homeownership and utilities, and for other purposes.
short_title: Rural Homeownership and Utilities Improvement Act of 1992

summary.text: Rural Homeownership and Utilities Improvement Act of 1992 - Amends the Farm Credit Act of 1971, for certain rural housing finance and secondary mortgage market purposes, to increase: (1) the percentage of outstanding loans that a Farm Credit Bank may have to persons other than farmers or ranchers; and (2) the population size for a rural area city or village. Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to permit water and waste facility loans and grants to individuals for connections to installations within a residence.

titles.title: Rural Homeownership and Utilities Improvement Act of 1992
A bill to amend the Farm Credit Act of 1971 and the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to improve rural homeownership and utilities, and for other purposes.
